member.name: IWICMetadataQueryWriter.RemoveMetadataByName
member.summary: Removes a metadata item from a specific location using a metadata query expression.
member.param: The name of the metadata item to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataQueryWriter.SetMetadataByName
member.summary: Sets a metadata item to a specific location.
member.param: The name of the metadata item.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataQueryWriter
member.summary: Exposes methods for setting or removing metadata blocks and items to an encoder or its image frames using a metadata query expression.
